Description: Limestone ostracon with text containing a letter from the monks of a dessert monastery to a wealthy layman.
Bibliographic references: Hall 1905 / Coptic and Greek Texts of the Christian Period from Ostraka, Stelae, etc. in the British Museum (p.87-88, pl.63)
Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (82743) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/82743)
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Rev Greville John Chester
Additional IDs: Miscellaneous number: O.Brit.Mus.Copt. I 63:3 (text edition abbreviation according to Oates et al 2001)
